import{FETCH_USERS_REQUEST,FETCH_USERS_FAIL,FETCH_USERS_SUCCESS}from'../actions/actionTypes';var usersListReducer=function usersListReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){// Register
case FETCH_USERS_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case FETCH_USERS_SUCCESS:return{users:action.payload};case FETCH_USERS_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export default usersListReducer;
